channel.title: Vista Re-format?
channel.description:
So I have vista installed.
I inserted the disk and expected to be able to do a clean installation. Reformatting my hard drive COMPLETELY. But the partition thing didnt come up so I couldnt delete all the extra crap.
Ran from desktop, nothin'.
How can I reformat my WHOLE drive and reinstall vista?

item.title: Vista Re-format?
item.dc:creator: @KoRnRoOsTeR KoRnRoOsTeR
item.description:
@KoRnRoOsTeR wrote:

boot from it. you can use vlite look in 3rd party stuff and find its posted by RON and theirs a tut for XP and Vista good program. I recommend you use that because it saves the drivers and you can remove the stuff you dont want that comes with the vista installation disk (ex paint,Snipper,games…ETC

Read full topic
